caseName: Management issue detected on ONU model 2466GN (S7.0.021) provisioned on V1-16XC

allProps.Case Name: Management Issue on ONT Model 2466GN (S7.0.021) provisioned on V1-16XC

resumen: A problem was detected when trying to remotely access ONT via HTTP and Telnet. The issue escalated with Zhone after several verification tests confirmed that the issue was due to the fact that ONTs from the manufacturer only allow a predefined list of IP address ranges for security purposes.
detalleDelProblema: A problem was detected when trying to remotely access ONTs via HTTP and Telnet. The issue is scaled with Zhone, after several checks confirmed that the problem is due to the factory ONTs only allowing access from a pre-approved range of IP addresses for security reasons.
resolucion:
Hi Jose,

As discussed in the session, for security reasons, only the following IP address ranges are allowed management access to the zNID:

192.168.0.0 - 192.168.255.255

10.0.0.0 - 10.255.255.255

172.16.0.0 - 172.31.255.255

Please try with any IP within these ranges and see if the issue is resolved.

caseName: MXK F-108 is not allowing DNS packet traffic (using Port 53/UDP) from core network towards router connected to ONU (in bridge mode).

resumen: A block was detected at the level of the MXK-F108 OLT where DNS traffic from the FiberX network to a connected device via an ONT provisioned on another OLT, did not carry correctly. ZHONE provided a configuration to resolve the issue.
detalleDelProblema: A blocking was detected at the level of the OLT mxk-F108, where DNS traffic from the FiberX network to an equipment connected to a provisioned ONT on another OLT did not work correctly. Zhone provided us with a configuration to resolve the issue.
resolucion:
Here is the translation:

Try to disable the Downstream DNS Filter.

Downstream DNS Filter Feature Enable/Disable discards of downstream DNS queries received on the WAN uplink interface. Default = Enabled.

Via ONT Web UI The option is located on the Config->VLAN Modes screen.

caseName: Collaboration to identify unstable behavior and intermittent issues with OLT MXK-F108.

allProps.Case Name: Coloboracion para identificar comportamiento inestable e intermitemte de OLT MXK-F108

resumen: Intermittent connectivity issues were reported on the OLT MXK-F108 (1 single card) and for provisioned services on this device. The case was escalated to Zhone for assistance, multiple remote Teams sessions were conducted to stabilize the equipment after several days. No conclusive diagnostic from Zhone nor a definitive solution to the problem was received.
detalleDelProblema: There were intermittent connections on the OLT MXK-F108 (1 single card) and services provisioned with this setup, where Zhone was escalated for assistance. Multiple remote sessions via Teams were conducted with the provider, testing the affected equipment. The equipment stabilized without any specific changes after several days, however, no conclusive diagnostic from Zhone nor a definitive solution to the problem was received.
resolucion:
Technical Support Report

The equipment is currently stable. The following actions were taken without achieving a conclusive result:

* Upgrade MXK 1u.
* Upgrade of ONT 2424A1 to 4.2.004
The equipment generally appears to be in good condition, with:
- Optical power on the ONT at -23dbm (OK)
- Temperature OK
- CPU and memory OK
- Voltage OK

Recommendations if the issue is encountered again:

* Have a console present for better debugging in case the inband management is lost.
* Turn off one of the linkagg arms to freeze traffic on a single interface, as the MAC hash validating traffic over links may be causing packets to be dropped occasionally. Example:
> linkagg arm 0 disable
Or, alternatively:

* Perform a local test by connecting a laptop to an uplink port with an SFP electrical connection (e.g., port 1-1-4-0/eth) and configuring a bridge untagged on this port with the problematic VLAN. Then, test connectivity from that point to isolate the issue.

Note: Replace 'exemplo' with 'example'.

caseName: CloudCheck is not detecting 5G Wi-Fi configuration.

allProps.Case Name: CloudCheck is not detecting 5G wifi configuration

resumen:
Once configured and CloudCheck is enabled, CloudCheck is not showing the 5G SSID even though the ONT webUI and the CLI are showing the 5G active. When the VLAN mapping is applied to radio 6 (WL1.1) - DZS5G_SSID1 the 5G SSID appears in CC, but it is not the expected SSID from radio 5 (WL1.0)- Eladivinowifi-5G.

We have reverted the customer back to version 7.0.064 which is working as expected until a new version becomes available.
detalleDelProblema: Once configured and CloudCheck is enabled, CloudCheck is not displaying the 5G SSID despite the ONT web UI and CLI showing the 5G active. When VLAN mapping is applied to radio 6 (WL1.1) - DZS5G_SSID1, the 5G SSID does appear in CC, but it is not the expected SSID from radio 5 (WL1.0)- Eladivinowifi-5G. We have reverted the customer back to version 7.0.064, which works as expected until a new version becomes available.
resolucion: Once configured and CloudCheck is enabled, CloudCheck is not showing the 5G SSID even though the ONT web UI and CLI are showing the 5G active. When VLAN mapping is applied to radio 6 (WL1.1) - DZS5G_SSID1, the 5G SSID does appear in CC, but it is not the expected SSID from radio 5 (WL1.0)- Eladivinowifi-5G. We have reverted the customer back to firmware version 7.0.064, which is working as expected until a new version becomes available.

caseName: Issue with ONU Provisioning

allProps.Case Name: problema con Aprovisionamiento de ONU

resumen: When attempting to provision 3 ONUs, the equipment model was not displayed. The model was manually inputted but the configuration was not adopted. The bridge created did not appear and the ONU still appears in the show. A Zhone configuration fix was received to resolve the issue.
detalleDelProblema: Upon attempting to provision 3 ONUs, the Equipment Model was not visible, so it was manually set but the configuration was not adopted. The bridge created did not appear and the ONU continues to show up in the show commands. Configuration from Zhone was received to resolve the issue.
resolucion:
Check the existing setting of the card-init-string field by using the card show command.

If the setting is null or 32onu, then proceed to Step 2.

zSH> card show

Card Init String: --------> {}

Or,

zSH> card show

Card Init String: --------> {32onu}

2. Set the default ONU size to 64onu by changing the

card-init-string to 64onu.

zSH> update card-profile card-atm-configuration = notapplicable 1/1/10550

zSH> update card-profile card-init-string = 64onu 1/1/10550

zSH> card show

Card Init String: --------> {64onu}

caseName:
MXK-LC-GP16-3
It is not allowing to consult information from ONTS such as ont status and ont rx signal info.
Additionally, the SNMP agent in the OLT is not allowing SNP polling.

allProps.Case Name: MXK-LC-GP16-3 It is not allowing to consult information from onts such as ont status and ont rx signal info.Additionally, the snmp agent in the OLT is not allowing¬†  snmp polling

resumen: An issue was detected with the OLT MXK-COBIAN219 that was preventing SNMP queries for information about ONTS, as Zhone reported. The process associated with SNMP on the OLT presented a blockage and required restarting the OLT to resolve the issue.
detalleDelProblema: Detection revealed that the OLT MXK-COBIAN219 was not allowing SNMP query of information on the ONTS. Zhone indicated the associated process for SNMP on the OLT, which presented a block and required restarting the OLT to solve the issue.
resolucion:
Carrying out a detailed analysis, we observed that the SNMP process accountable for communication between the management card and the line cards has ceased functioning.
It requires being restarted. However, unfortunately, in order to initiate this restart, the card needs to be rebooted.

---

Note: I translated "Olta" as OLT (Outside Plant Termination Point) which is more commonly used term in English. If you want to keep the original Spanish term, please let me know.

caseName: Activation of V1-16XC fails during provisioning with ONU model number 2466GN.

allProps.Case Name: V1-16XC activation fail during provisioning ONT model 2466GN

resumen:
Here is the translation:

A fault was encountered during activation of 2466GN in V1-16XC, with ONT power levels within range but the OLT generated an ACTIVATION FAIL. During the incident, a patch chord change was attempted, but the fault continued. The ONT was in good condition as it had been tested in storage.

To attempt to solve the issue, the OLT was restarted and another OLT of the same model was swapped. However, the fault persisted. In the final stage, Zhone informed us that the issue was pending a new firmware release to correct the problem.
notas:
Hello Rogeiro,

I am sharing the requested information.



> Have you ever tested the 2466GN on a V1-16XC before?

Yes, Sr, we usually install the model 2466GN for our clients with internet services in this OLT V1-16XC but lately we have found that sometimes the OLT is rejecting the activation. We are investigating the reason for this unexpected behavior.



>What is the current sw load you are running on this 2466GN ?

(D)(R) S7.0.081 



>Can you also please send the full show running-config on this OLT?



I attached the running-config requested



Would you agree to upgrade the ONU to latest GA load S7.0.100 and see if it improves the results?

I am not sure yet why we are having this problem, but we know that version you are currently using has a bug that sometimes causes memory issues on ONU and makes it less responsive or even stop working. I wonder if improving the memory usage will respond better.

Here is the link for the new GA in case you do accept to test: ftp://ftp.zhone.com/outgoing/_1week/FIBERX/

caseName: Support for determining the root cause of MXK-LC-GP16-3 OLT (Outdoor Line Termination) failure necessitating an electrical reset to reactivate OLT function.

allProps.Case Name: Support for finding out the cause of OLT (MXK-LC-GP16-3) blocking which required electrical reset to restore OLT operation

resumen: Abnormal operation detected in OLT MXK. The device occasionally fails to respond to ping, SNMP, Telnet, and HTTP requests. To resolve the issue, the OLT was restarted, and Zhone recommendations were followed.
detalleDelProblema:
Abnormal operation detected in OLT MXK, the device was unresponsive to ping, snmp, telnet and http for moments, to resolve the issue, the OLT was restarted but scaled with Zhone for a post-analysis and to identify the causes of this abnormal operation,

By Zhone's recommendation, the following steps were taken:

1. Badly installed board. Please check that the card is correctly fixed and screwed all the way. If you do not secure it until the end, we may have poor contact with the bus pins and cause the reported problem.

2- Hardware problem on the LC card (The most common)

3- OLT bus problem. (perform a visual inspection to ensure there are no damaged or damaged pins)

4- Hardware problem on the M1 card
resolucion:
Here is the translated text:

- The following factors were corrected that Zhone suggested reviewing:
 
1- Badly installed board. Please check that the card is correctly fixed and screwed all the way. If you do not secure it until the end, we may have poor contact with the bus pins and cause the reported problem.

2- Hardware problem on the LC card (The most common)

3- OLT bus problem. (perform a visual inspection to ensure there are no damaged or damaged pins)

4- Hardware problem on the M1 card.

caseName: ONT 5302 provisioned on V1-16XC xGSPON port with SFP+ module XGS-GP-COMBO-SFP+, but the Hisense LTF5308B-BHB+ device fails to transmit packets when the MTU is set above 1500.

allProps.Case Name: ONU 5302 provisioned in V1-16XC xgspon port with sfp+ module XGS-GP-COMBO-SFP+ Hisense LTF5308B-BHB+ doesn't pass packets with MTU greater than 1500

resumen: Due to a customer report, it was detected that the ONU 5302 was not passing an MTU above 1500. It was determined that there was a problem with the LTF5308B-BHB+ module installed on the XGSPON port of the OLT, which was replaced with the HISENSE LTF5308B-BCA+ model.
detalleDelProblema: Due to a customer report, it was detected that ONU 5302 is not passing an MTU of 1500 or higher on V1-16XC xGSpon with SFP+ module XGS-GP-COMBO-SFP+ Hisense LTF5308B-BHB+, which does not transmit packets with an MTU of 1500 or higher.
resolucion: It was determined that there was a problem with the module LTF5308B-BHB+ installed on port XGSPON of the OLT, which was replaced by model HISENSE LTF5308B-BCA+.

caseName: OLT does not allow changing MTU on PON port and XGSPON port.

allProps.Case Name: OLT no deja cambiar MTU en puerto PON y puerto XGSPON

resumen: Problem identified while assigning MTU on G.pon interfaces of OLT V1-16XC.
detalleDelProblema: A problem was identified when assigning MTU on Gpon interfaces of OLT v1-16xc, as reported by Zhone, it is required to assign the MTU at the level of ports "integroup", so that consequently the ports ONU belonging to these interfaces take the defined MTU in the intergroup.
resolucion:
Hi Jose,

MTU for PON interface can be configured in the associated intergroup interface.

One intergroup is composed of two XGSPON and two GPON interfaces, and for example, ig0/1 is composed of xgspon0/1, xgspon0/2, gpon0/1 and gpon0/2.

If you changed MTU to 9216 on intergroup0/1, therefore, MTU will be set to 9216 for xgspon0/1, xgspon0/2, gpon0/1 and gpon0/2.

SWITCH# show running-config interface intergroup 0/1
!
interface intergroup 0/1

 mtu 9216

caseName: Test Failure

allProps.Case Name: Falla de Prueba

resumen:
Technical issues with our network equipment have been reported. The OLT (Optical Line Terminal) of model number ZH-200X-1 is experiencing issues with its FiberX connection to the ONU (Optical Network Unit). The V1-16XC device is unable to establish a stable connection with the MXK switch.

The problem began after the latest software update, which introduced version 3.2.4 of the FiberX firmware. The error message indicates that the OLT has lost contact with the fiber optic network and is unable to reconnect.

We have checked all connections and settings, but the issue persists. A technical support engineer will be sent to inspect the equipment and perform any necessary repairs or software updates.
notas:
Technical issues with our FiberX network have caused outages in multiple locations. We are experiencing connectivity problems on multiple Zhone OLTs and have observed an increase in errors on V1-16XC nodes. Additionally, there seems to be a issue with the MXK system, causing dropped calls and disconnections on our FiberX connections. A team of engineers is currently investigating the root cause of these issues and will provide an update once resolved.

Please let me know if you'd like me to translate anything else!
detalleDelProblema:
Here is the translation:

 Sample textSample textSample text
resolucion: Example textExample textExample textExample textExample textExample textExample text

caseName: Wi-Fi problems.

allProps.Case Name: WIFI Problems

resumen: Several WiFi issues were detected on the OLT 2428B1. Upgrading to Zhone resulted in sharing firmware to resolve problems.
detalleDelProblema:
Multiple WiFi issues were detected on the OLT 2428B1, when scaling to Zhone, firmware was provided to resolve issues.

In detail, the problems were:

* The SSID does not appear or takes a long time to appear [although it is correctly configured].
* Password error [although it has been verified that the correct password has been entered].
* Low speeds [even when tested just next to the device].
resolucion:
Edwuar, latest GA version for model 2428B1 is 4.1.315 GA.

This version includes the WIFI Insight tool which is useful to monitor WiFi networks in customer sites and troubleshoot. I would recommend using this version during our test.

Version can be downloaded from the following link: 
Also attached some screenshots of the tool.

caseName: Collaboration with support to identify the cause of intermittent BGP traffic issues on ONT 2424A provisioned in OLT V1-16XC.

allProps.Case Name: Colaboraci√≥n con apoyo para identificar la causa de intermitencia en tr√°fico BGP en ONT 2424A aprovisionada en OLT V1-16XC

resumen: Interruptions in BGP traffic were detected on OLT 2424A. Remote sessions with Zhone were conducted to identify the issue, which was resolved in our configuration.
detalleDelProblema:
Intermittent issues with BGP traffic were detected on ONT 2424A. Remote sessions with Zhone identified the issue in our configuration, which was corrected.

- OLT: Outside Termination Device
- ONU: Outdoor Network Unit
- Zhone: A brand of fiber-optic networking equipment.
- FiberX: A product name for a specific type of fiber-optic network.
- V1-16XC: A model number and code.
- MXK: A model number and code.
resolucion: Intermittent issues with BGP traffic were detected on ONT 2424A. Remote sessions were conducted with Zhone, where an issue was identified in the configuration that was corrected.

caseName: FiberX - CloudCheck Hide Wireless Network

allProps.Case Name: Fiber X - CloudCheck hide wireless network

resumen: A case was generated to request that Zhone add the possibility of hiding Wi-Fi networks in CloudCheck as it was not available and several clients requested this functionality. From Zhone's side, they informed that it would be implemented; however, this has never been done.
detalleDelProblema: We generated a case requiring Zhone to add the possibility of hiding Wi-Fi networks in CloudCheck, as this option was not available and several clients requested this functionality.
resolucion:
From Zhone finally responded:
I have confirmed and at this moment there is no way to hide the wireless network on CC.
There is a TR opened as a Feature Request (CCHECK-26656) to implement it.

caseName: Assistance to determine the cause of intermittent issues presented with connection to OLT MXK-F108 (1 single card) and on services provisioned on this.

allProps.Case Name: Asistencia para determinar la causa de intermitencia presentada en conexi√≥n a OLT MXK-F108 ( 1 sola tarjeta ) y en servicios aprovisionados en esta.

resumen: Intermittencies were reported on connection to OLT MXK-F108 (1 single card) and services provisioned on this, the case was escalated with Zhone for assistance. Several remote Teams sessions were conducted, the equipment stabilized after several days. No conclusive diagnosis from Zhone was received nor a definitive solution to the problem.
notas:
Cordial saludo team,

We appreciate Omar Gonzalez, who helped us last time under the ticket number 108574, if possible to assist in a remote session to analyze the possible cause of this failure which is the same. We detected packet losses ranging from 15% when performing an extended ping from our HPE switch (where the uplink connects via LINKAGG) towards the IP address of the OLT.

Our HPE switch has the IP address 100.84.222.253, and the OLT has the IP address 100.84.222.254.

This intermittent failure is affecting two customers provisioned on the OLT:

-fx-224993-jpicacaprilosprados 1/1/8
-fx-230147-jardinelpatioinc 1/3/2

From our side, we verified the physical link between OLT and OK node, i.e., there are no errors or drops in the two ports that form the LINKAGG. Additionally, the optical signal is observed to be okay, nor are there flaps or packet losses in the ports. Furthermore, we also restarted the equipment and observed that the connection stabilized for 20 minutes but then started having packet losses again.

We have attached a traffic capture made on the uplink ports of the OLT if it is useful.
We have also attached evidence of monitoring services affected that led us to these customers where you can see packet losses in their connections.

Attached in diagnostic_commands.txt is the result of executing the commands:

detalleDelProblema:
Intermittent connection issues were presented on OLT MXK-F108 (1 single card) and services provisioned on this were escalated to Zhone for assistance. Several remote sessions via Teams with the supplier were conducted, where tests were performed on the device in question. The equipment stabilized without making any specific changes after several days. A conclusive diagnostic from Zhone was not received, nor a definitive solution to the problem.

---
resolucion: For this case, we did not receive a definitive solution from the provider; the team stabilized without making any specific changes.

caseName: Fault in provisioning of ONUs on OLT V1-16XC.

allProps.Case Name: Falla en aprovisionamiento de ONUs en OLT V1-16XC

resumen:
Inconveniences with the V1-16XC OLT when provisioning new GPON services. Observed behavior is that the OLT fails to correctly detect and activate the ONU, despite physical infrastructure being operational.

---
notas: The inconvenience persists when provisioning some ONUs in OLTs in production. The optical budget of the equipment that presents problems has been sent for provisioning.
detalleDelProblema:
Events logged in the terminal monitor of the OLT during provisioning:

2026-01-15 13:37:23 GPON[7859]: DISCOVERED serial-number ZNTS03d19d4d EqD=57364 (onu gpon0/9,10)
2026-01-15 13:37:23 GPON[7859]: ONU(gpon0/9,10) ACTIVATION FAIL, reason : Ranging (SN:ZNTS03d19d4d)
2026-01-15 13:37:23 GPON[7859]: ONU(gpon0/9,10) New Registered.(SN:)
2026-01-15 13:37:23 GPON[7859]: No Entry ONU(gpon0/9,10) serial-number
2026-01-15 13:37:43 GPON[7859]: DISCOVERED serial-number ZNTS03d19d4d EqD=57364 (onu gpon0/9,10)
2026-01-15 13:37:43 GPON[7859]: ONU(gpon0/9,10) Alarm LOAMi ON
2026-01-15 13:37:43 GPON[7859]: ONU(gpon0/9,10) ACTIVATION FAIL, reason : ONU alarm when PW authentication (SN:ZNTS03d19d4d)
2026-01-15 13:37:43 GPON[7859]: ONU(gpon0/9,10) Alarm LOAMi OFF
2026-01-15 13:37:43 GPON[7859]: ONU(gpon0/9,10) DEACTIVATION (Reason: LOAMi)
2026-01-15 13:37:53 GPON[7859]: DISCOVERED serial-number ZNTS03d19d4d EqD=57365 (onu gpon0/9,10)
2026-01-15 13:37:53 GPON[7859]: ONU(gpon0/9,10) Alarm LOAMi ON

The reported errors indicate failures during ranging and authentication (LOAMi / PW authentication), preventing the ONU from completing the activation process.

It is worth noting that on the same PON port (gpon0/9) there are multiple active customers connected to the same splitter and over the same fiber infrastructure.
resolucion:
The same issue was presented in the laboratory OLT. The requested steps were applied by the provider and resolved in the laboratory OLT; however, the inconvenience persists in the Carolina production OLT.

Details:

1. Inconsistent provisioning of ONT/UN.

The problem occurs in V1-16XC OLTs with SFP LTF5308B-BCA+.
When connecting different models such as 2466GN, 5228XG, and 5302XG, the OLT displays the message: ACTIVATION FAIL, reason: Ranging.

Tests were performed with the following commands:

olt specific-ploam disable ZNTS051d0e7f

olt specific-ploam disable ZNTS051d0ce5

olt specific-ploam enable ZNTS051d0e7f

discover-serial-number stop 

discover-serial-number start 5

onu add 7 ZNTS051d0e7f auto-learning

show system

show interface module-info gpon 0/1

shutdown

#wait 3 seconds

no shutdown

olt specific-ploam enable ZNTS051d0ce5

onu add 18 ZNTS051d0ce5 auto-learning

shutdown

no shutdown

olt signal-check enable

olt rogue-onu detect tx-always enable

show run | grep auto-transceiver-list

olt transceiver-type hisense-e

caseName: Assistance for resolving intermittent issues reported on subscribed customers in OLT MXK F-108 scaled win.

allProps.Case Name: Asistencia para solucionar intermitencias presentadas en suscriptores aprovisionados en OLT MXK F-108 escalado win

resumen: In this incident, intermittent issues were reported on one of our MXK-F108 OLTs, we identified these intermittent issues in the ping to private IP addresses of the ONTs provisioned within the OLT and public IP addresses of the internet services provisioned on these ONTs.
detalleDelProblema:
Good evening Zhone team,
Please assist us with reviewing your part, we are experiencing intermittent issues on one of our OLT MXK-F108 units. We have identified these issues at the private IP addresses of the managed ONTs provisioned within the OLT and to the public IPs of the internet services provisioned on these ONTs.

For example, one of the ONTs inside the OLT has an IP address of 10.252.5.75 and when we perform a ping from our aggregate switch to this ONT, we observe losses:

From Zhone, we are providing the following information:

Based on your test topology, the MTU size needs to be adjusted not only on the ONT but also on the uplink and intergroup interfaces to ensure proper operation.

Below is a sample config to set the MTU to 9230 when an ONT is attached to gpon0/13 and the uplink interface is eth0/17.

traffic-profile V2274T

tcont 1

gemport 1/1

uni eth 1

mtu 9230

!

interface ethernet 0/17

interface-usage network-port

speed 1g

bridge-group 1 spanning-tree disable

switchport mode trunk

switchport trunk allowed vlan add 33

vlan ingress mapping s-vid 33 swap-s-vid 33

mtu 9230

service-policy type queuing output ethernet 0/17.policy-map.queuing.def

no shutdown

ip dhcp snooping trust

ipv6 dhcp snooping trust

!

caseName: Constable loss of OLT 2466GN management

allProps.Case Name: Perdida constaste de manejo ONU 2466GN

resumen: Intermittent management loss is presented in the ONU model 2466GN associated with the V1-16XC, even after applying the recommended firmware S7.0.100.
detalleDelProblema:
Despite the firmware update of the ONUs, the issue persists and to recover the management of the ONU, it is necessary to execute the command "onu re-config", which causes a service interruption for each customer event.

---

(No changes made)
resolucion:
Received from the provider.

The engineering team requested to add the following command line to the GPON configuration on port GPON.

india65(config-if[gpon0/2])# onu ip-option 1 ip-host 1 ping traceroute 
india65(config-if[gpon0/2])# onu ip-option 2 ip-host 1 ping traceroute

caseName:
Issues with applying the ONU deactivate command and assistance: What is the command to set a default-scaled GPON port?

---

allProps.Case Name: Problemas para aplicar el comando onu deactivate y asistencia de cual es el comando para poner un puerto GPON default escalado w

resumen: Case was generated with Dasan to confirm the process of disabling an ONU.
detalleDelProblema: A case was generated with Dasan to confirm the process of deactivating an ONU on a GPON port, as it was using the command "onu deactivate", but the ONU would automatically activate at seconds, note the validations made additionally, we also requested your support to know the process of setting up a default GPON or XSPON port.
resolucion:
Solution
Comment:
Hi Winder,



Regarding PON reset, according to engineering, it is structurally impossible to reset only a PON port to its default settings with a single command.



Regarding ONU deactivation, using "no onu-profile ONU_ID" will result in the ONU no longer receiving service, while using "no onu ONU_ID" will exclude the ONU from all settings on the PON port, even if it remains physically active.

caseName: Assistance required to recover management on OLT V1-16XC, which accepts user credentials but fails to authenticate.

allProps.Case Name: Assistance to recover the management in OLT V1-16XC which receives the user name but blocks authentication.

resumen: Access to the OLT is lost via CLI, escalated with Zhone, it was determined that simultaneous access control for multiple users needed to be enforced in order to prevent blocking of accesses to the OLT.
detalleDelProblema: Access to the OLT was lost via CLI, escalated using ZHONE, it was determined that simultaneous access control for multiple users needed to be implemented to prevent access blocking on the OLT.
resolucion: The total number of remote sessions on V1-16XC is limited to 8 by default, and users cannot log in if the maximum limit of simultaneous connections has been reached.

caseName: Configuration losses occur on OLT V1-16XC firmware R5.03 #053 after a system restart.

allProps.Case Name: Problem with configuration losses on olt V1-16XC firmware R5.03 #053 when a reboot is applied

resumen: A detection was made that after the V1-16XC OLT was restarted, it would lose some configurations, which became evident in the running-config. It was detected that it was necessary to configure the OLT in a certain way so that this did not occur. An instruction was received from Zhone on how to apply the config.
detalleDelProblema:
It was detected that after the OLT V1-16XC was restarted, it lost some configurations, which could be seen in the running-config. 
The Zhone team informed that you cannot use the following command: 'switchport trunk allowed vlan all' instead, you need to add each VLAN individually to the membership of each interface, for example: "switchport trunk allowed vlan add 101,300,400-402,4000"
resolucion:
Change the following line:
'switchport trunk allowed vlan all'

To:

switchport trunk allowed vlan add 101,300,400-402,4000

Specifically, listing the VLANs individually on all interfaces.

caseName: Support for determining the cause of intermittency in OLT 2424A1 provisioned on MXK F108.

allProps.Case Name: Support for finding out the cause of Intermitence in ont (2424A1) provisioned on MXK F108

resumen: Intermittencies were reported in connection to OLT MXK-F108 (1 single card) and services provisioned on it, a case was escalated with Zhone for assistance, several remote Teams sessions were conducted, the equipment stabilized after several days, no conclusive diagnosis from Zhone was received, nor a definitive solution to the problem.
detalleDelProblema: Intermittencies were encountered in connection with OLT MXK-F108 (1 single card) and on the services provisioned on this, a case was escalated to Zhone for assistance. Several remote sessions via Teams were conducted, the equipment stabilized after several days, no conclusive diagnosis from Zhone or a definitive solution to the problem was received, and ultimately the equipment had to be replaced to stabilize the intermittencies.
resolucion:
Dear Daniel,

We appreciate all the help provided with this case. We decided to replace the OLT by one of the same model. The new OLT has been working normally for several days. Additionally, the client that reported intermittence is already working stable. Furthermore, the web interface of the ONT is now loading normally. Thank you very much for all your support with this case.

---

Or, in a more formal tone:

Dear Daniel,

We would like to express our gratitude for the assistance provided with this case. We have replaced the OLT with one of the same model. The new OLT has been operating as expected for several days. Furthermore, the client who initially reported intermittent issues is now stable. Moreover, the web interface of the ONT is functioning normally. We appreciate your support in resolving this case.

---

Please note that there are different ways to translate a technical report, and the tone may vary depending on the organization's style guide or the level of formality required. These two options provide slightly different tones while maintaining the same content.

resumen: There is intermittent issue with the OLT fx.oldz.juanadiaz.f108, packet loss on the IP of management. Received Zhone commands for equipment stabilization while releasing new firmware.
notas: The solution is not permanent, Zhone indicates that correction will be made with new software version.
detalleDelProblema:
The issue is with the configuration of rule 47.

This rule manages the processing of ARP packets in TLS bridges. ARP packets on this type of bridge should not be directed to the CPU, as they may occupy it and cause packet losses.

caseName: Packet OSPF does not pass through OLT HX-5228XG-NA: (S7.0.025) provisioned in V1-16XC (R5.03 #053).

resumen: Inconveniences were detected when attempting to transport OSPF traffic over the ONU model HX-5228XG operating in bridge mode.
notas:
Currently, problems persist with OLTs designed to function as routers, specifically models 2466GN and HX-5228XG, even when configured in bridge mode.

In these scenarios, BGP and OSPF sessions experience constant drops. The situation was stabilized only by replacing the aforementioned ONUs with model 5302, which does not exhibit the described issues.
detalleDelProblema:
- Issues are identified when attempting to pass traffic OSPF on ONUs model HX-5228XG with firmware version S7.0.025, operating in bridge mode.

- The OSPF session is unable to establish itself correctly. 
- All tests were performed on our laboratory OLT, where the behavior was consistent and reproducible.
resolucion:
The manufacturer supplied the firmware version hx5228xgsip_0700093, which is supposed to address the reported issue.

Nevertheless, even updating the available firmware on the ONU HX-5228XG, the problem persists.

During a remote session, the OSPF session was temporarily lifted by disabling DNS Proxy functionality on the ONU and applying the "vp mcast s-vid 2323" configuration to the PON port of the OLT.
